Name: maximize_team_availability
Description: Maximize the overall availability of team members for the project

Name: minimize_project_budget
Description: Minimize the total budget spent on the project

Name: maximize_feature_priority
Description: Maximize the number of high-priority features delivered

Name: minimize_blocker_severity
Description: Minimize the impact of blockers by focusing on high severity ones

Name: maximize_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Maximize the rate of successfully achieved sprint goals

Name: maximize_velocity
Description: Maximize the team's average velocity to improve throughput

Name: minimize_task_effort
Description: Minimize the total effort required to complete all tasks

Name: maximize_stakeholder_influence
Description: Prioritize features for stakeholders with high influence

Name: minimize_sprint_duration
Description: Minimize the duration of sprints to increase feedback frequency
